alert.note: Alert for La Salle; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 6:58PM CDT until June 03 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central La Salle County in south central Texas... Northwestern Webb County in south central Texas... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 657 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northwest of Las Tiendas, or 26 miles west of Encinal, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... La Esperanza Ranch Airport, Artesia Wells and Chaparral Wildlife Management Area. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 46 and 57. US Highway 83 between mile markers 668 and 680. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
